nodes.text: H'Grathi was a region of space. A winding hyperspace route led through H'Grathi, connecting to the planet Pandem Nai. Several weeks after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, scouts from the New Republic frigate Hellion's Dare were spotted by the Galactic Empire on the route through H'Grathi, leading the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, which had fortified on Pandem Nai, to send the cruiser-carrier Aerie to attack the frigate.

When designing a plan for an attack on Pandem Nai and its Imperial forces, New Republic Intelligence agent Caern Adan presumed the path through H'Grathi was set with an early warning mechanism, ruling it out for possible use.
H'Grathi was mentioned in Alphabet Squadron, a novel written by Alexander Freed and published in 2019.
